FuncDef:
The backup track monitor-location-group command enables an interface to monitor the status of a CGN backup monitoring group.
The undo backup track monitor-location-group command disables an interface from monitoring the status of a CGN backup monitoring group.
By default, no interface is configured to monitor the status of a CGN backup monitoring group.

ParaDef.Info:
Monitor-location-group name.
The name is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CU separation mode, when N:1 warm backup coexists with distributed CGN, to enable an interface to monitor the CGN backup monitoring group, run the backup track monitor-location-group command.
Prerequisites
The cu-agent command has been run on the device.
